name: Kevin Bedell
body:
### Welcome to the Github Page of Kevin Bedell. 
I'm a coder, engineering manager, father -- and all around creative guy.  

Find me:

* [GitHub](http://github.com/kevinzen)
* [@kbedell on Twitter](https://twitter.com/#!/kbedell)
* [Google+](http://plus.google.com/109278961599975600282)
* [Stack Overflow](http://stackoverflow.com/users/267025/kevin-bedell)
* [My Blog](http://www.kbedell.com)
* [My Resume (a bit out of date)](http://www.kbedell.com/resume/BedellResume.pdf))
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
